/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
